title: Perform a Ground Vibration Test (GVT)
description: Test engineers need to perform a GVT on a new aircraft to identify its natural frequencies and validate structural models.

tasks.description: Attach hundreds of accelerometers to strategic points on the aircraft's structure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all sensors are correctly installed and connected.

tasks.description: Use electrodynamic shakers to excite the structure at different frequencies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent operates the shakers to vibrate the aircraft according to the test plan.

tasks.description: Analyze the accelerometer data to identify the aircraft's modal frequencies and damping ratios, and compare them to the FEA model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the data and confirms the structural model is accurate.
